name: @elizaos/plugin-web3-connector
description: A plugin for ElizaOS that provides creative storage solutions using Filecoin and IPFS.
author: Ahead Technologies

scripts.test-with-cli: cd ../cli && bun run build && cd ../plugin-starter && elizaos test
scripts.build:wasm: cd filecoin-rs && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg --release && cd ..
scripts.build:wasm:dev: cd filecoin-rs &&  wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg && cd ..
scripts.build:ui: cd filecoin-rs && cd data_miner/src-tauri/ && cargo build && cargo run && cd ../..
scripts.build:ui:dev: cd data_miner/src-tauri/ && cargo build && cargo run --release && cd ../..
scripts.build:ui:release: cd data_miner/src-tauri/ && cargo build --release && cargo run --release && cd ../..
scripts.build:data-miner: cd filecoin-rs && cd data_miner/src-tauri/ && cargo build && cargo run
scripts.build:wasm:debug: cd filecoin-rs && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg
scripts.build:wasm:release:dev: cd filecoin-rs && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg --release
